arabicText: فَكَيْفَ إِذَا جِئْنَا مِن كُلِّ أُمَّةٍۭ بِشَهِيدٍۢ وَجِئْنَا بِكَ عَلَىٰ هَـٰٓؤُلَآءِ شَهِيدًۭا
englishTranslationText:
So	how	will	it	be	when	We	bring	a	witness	
from	each	nation	(religion),	and	We	bring	
you	(O	 dear	 Prophet	 Muhammad - peace	
and	 blessings	 be	 upon	 him)	 as	 a	 witness	
and	 a	 watcher	 over	 them?	 (The	 Holy	
Prophet	is	a	witness	from	Allah.)
romanUrduTranslationText:
To	 kaisi	 hogi	 jab	 ham	 har	 Ummat	 se	 ek	
gawāh	lāyeñ	aur	aey	Mehboob tumheiñ	un	
sab	 par	 gawāh	 aur	 nigeh-bān	 banā	 kar	
lāyeñ

arabicText: يَوْمَئِذٍۢ يَوَدُّ ٱلَّذِينَ كَفَرُوا۟ وَعَصَوُا۟ ٱلرَّسُولَ لَوْ تُسَوَّىٰ بِهِمُ ٱلْأَرْضُ وَلَا يَكْتُمُونَ ٱللَّهَ حَدِيثًۭا
englishTranslationText:
On	 that	 day,	 those	 who	 disbelieved	 and	
disobeyed	the	Noble	Messenger	will	wish	
that	 they	 be	 buried	 and	 the	 ground	
levelled	above	them;	and	they	will	not	be	
able	to	hide	anything	from	Allah.
romanUrduTranslationText:
Us	 din	 tamanna	 kareñ	 ge	 woh	 jinhoñ	 ne	
kufr	kiyā	aur	Rasool	ki	na-farmāni	ki	kāsh	
unheiñ	 mitti	 meiñ	 dabā	 kar	 zameen	
barābar	kar	di	jāye	aur	koi	bāt	Allah	se	na	
chupā	sakeñ	ge

arabicText: يَـٰٓأَيُّهَا ٱلَّذِينَ ءَامَنُوا۟ لَا تَقْرَبُوا۟ ٱلصَّلَوٰةَ وَأَنتُمْ سُكَـٰرَىٰ حَتَّىٰ تَعْلَمُوا۟ مَا تَقُولُونَ وَلَا جُنُبًا إِلَّا عَابِرِى سَبِيلٍ حَتَّىٰ تَغْتَسِلُوا۟ ۚ وَإِن كُنتُم مَّرْضَىٰٓ أَوْ عَلَىٰ سَفَرٍ أَوْ جَآءَ أَحَدٌۭ مِّنكُم مِّنَ ٱلْغَآئِطِ أَوْ لَـٰمَسْتُمُ ٱلنِّسَآءَ فَلَمْ تَجِدُوا۟ مَآءًۭ فَتَيَمَّمُوا۟ صَعِيدًۭا طَيِّبًۭا فَٱمْسَحُوا۟ بِوُجُوهِكُمْ وَأَيْدِيكُمْ ۗ إِنَّ ٱللَّهَ كَانَ عَفُوًّا غَفُورًا
englishTranslationText:
O	 People	 who	 Believe!	 Do	 not	 approach	
the	prayer	when	you	are	intoxicated	until	you	have	the	sense	to	understand	what	you	say,	nor	
in	the	state	of	impurity	until	you	have	bathed	except	while	travelling;	and	if	you	are	ill	or	on	a	
journey	 or	 one	 of	 you	 returns	 from	 answering	 the	 call	 of	 nature	 or	 you	 have	 cohabited	with	
women,	 and	 you	 do	 not	 find	 water,	 then	 cleanse	(yourself)	with	 clean	 soil	- therefore	 stroke	
your	faces	and	your	hands	with	it;	indeed	Allah is	Most	Pardoning,	Oft	Forgiving.
romanUrduTranslationText:
Aey	 Imān	 wālo!	 Nashe	 ki	 hālat	 meiñ	
Namāz	ke	pās	na	jāo	jab	 tak	itnā	hosh	na	
ho	 ke	jo	 kaho	 usey	 samjho	 aur	 na	 na-pāki	 ki	 hālat	meiñ	 be-nahāye	magar	musāfiri	meiñ	 aur	
agar	tum	bimār	ho	yā	safar	meiñ	ya	tum	meiñ	se	koi	qazā-e-hājat	se	āya	ho	yā	tum	ne	aurtoñ	ko	
chuwa	aur	pāni	na	pāya	to	pāk	mitti	se	tayammum	karo	to	apne	muñh	aur	hāth	ka	masāh	karo	
beshak	Allah	mu'āf	farmāne	wāla	bakhsh	ne	wāla	hai

arabicText: يَـٰٓأَيُّهَا ٱلَّذِينَ ءَامَنُوا۟ لَا تَقْرَبُوا۟ ٱلصَّلَوٰةَ وَأَنتُمْ سُكَـٰرَىٰ حَتَّىٰ تَعْلَمُوا۟ مَا تَقُولُونَ وَلَا جُنُبًا إِلَّا عَابِرِى سَبِيلٍ حَتَّىٰ تَغْتَسِلُوا۟ ۚ وَإِن كُنتُم مَّرْضَىٰٓ أَوْ عَلَىٰ سَفَرٍ أَوْ جَآءَ أَحَدٌۭ مِّنكُم مِّنَ ٱلْغَآئِطِ أَوْ لَـٰمَسْتُمُ ٱلنِّسَآءَ فَلَمْ تَجِدُوا۟ مَآءًۭ فَتَيَمَّمُوا۟ صَعِيدًۭا طَيِّبًۭا فَٱمْسَحُوا۟ بِوُجُوهِكُمْ وَأَيْدِيكُمْ ۗ إِنَّ ٱللَّهَ كَانَ عَفُوًّا غَفُورًا
englishTranslationText:
O	 People	 who	 Believe!	 Do	 not	 approach	
the	prayer	when	you	are	intoxicated	until	you	have	the	sense	to	understand	what	you	say,	nor	
in	the	state	of	impurity	until	you	have	bathed	except	while	travelling;	and	if	you	are	ill	or	on	a	
journey	 or	 one	 of	 you	 returns	 from	 answering	 the	 call	 of	 nature	 or	 you	 have	 cohabited	with	
women,	 and	 you	 do	 not	 find	 water,	 then	 cleanse	(yourself)	with	 clean	 soil	- therefore	 stroke	
your	faces	and	your	hands	with	it;	indeed	Allah is	Most	Pardoning,	Oft	Forgiving.
romanUrduTranslationText:
Aey	 Imān	 wālo!	 Nashe	 ki	 hālat	 meiñ	
Namāz	ke	pās	na	jāo	jab	 tak	itnā	hosh	na	
ho	 ke	jo	 kaho	 usey	 samjho	 aur	 na	 na-pāki	 ki	 hālat	meiñ	 be-nahāye	magar	musāfiri	meiñ	 aur	
agar	tum	bimār	ho	yā	safar	meiñ	ya	tum	meiñ	se	koi	qazā-e-hājat	se	āya	ho	yā	tum	ne	aurtoñ	ko	
chuwa	aur	pāni	na	pāya	to	pāk	mitti	se	tayammum	karo	to	apne	muñh	aur	hāth	ka	masāh	karo	
beshak	Allah	mu'āf	farmāne	wāla	bakhsh	ne	wāla	hai

arabicText: أَلَمْ تَرَ إِلَى ٱلَّذِينَ أُوتُوا۟ نَصِيبًۭا مِّنَ ٱلْكِتَـٰبِ يَشْتَرُونَ ٱلضَّلَـٰلَةَ وَيُرِيدُونَ أَن تَضِلُّوا۟ ٱلسَّبِيلَ
englishTranslationText:
Did	you	not	see	 those	who	received	a	portion	of	 the	Book,	 that	 they	purchase	error	and	wish	
that	you	too	go	astray	from	the	right	path?
romanUrduTranslationText:
Kiyā tum	ne	unheiñ	na	dekhā	jin	ko	kitāb	se	ek	hissa	milā	gumrāhi	mol	lete	haiñ	aur	chāhte	haiñ	
ke	tum	bhi	rāh	se	bahek	jāo

arabicText: وَٱللَّهُ أَعْلَمُ بِأَعْدَآئِكُمْ ۚ وَكَفَىٰ بِٱللَّهِ وَلِيًّۭا وَكَفَىٰ بِٱللَّهِ نَصِيرًۭا
englishTranslationText:
Allah well	 knows	 your enemies;	 Allah is	
Sufficient	 as	 a	 Guardian,	 and	 Allah is	
Sufficient	as	a	Supporter.
romanUrduTranslationText:
Aur	 Allah	 khoob	 jānta	 hai	 tumhāre	
dushmanoñ	ko	aur	Allah	kāfi	hai	wāli	aur	
Allah	kāfi	hai	madad-gār

arabicText: وَٱللَّهُ أَعْلَمُ بِأَعْدَآئِكُمْ ۚ وَكَفَىٰ بِٱللَّهِ وَلِيًّۭا وَكَفَىٰ بِٱللَّهِ نَصِيرًۭا
englishTranslationText:
Allah well	 knows	 your enemies;	 Allah is	
Sufficient	 as	 a	 Guardian,	 and	 Allah is	
Sufficient	as	a	Supporter.
romanUrduTranslationText:
Aur	 Allah	 khoob	 jānta	 hai	 tumhāre	
dushmanoñ	ko	aur	Allah	kāfi	hai	wāli	aur	
Allah	kāfi	hai	madad-gār

arabicText: مِّنَ ٱلَّذِينَ هَادُوا۟ يُحَرِّفُونَ ٱلْكَلِمَ عَن مَّوَاضِعِهِۦ وَيَقُولُونَ سَمِعْنَا وَعَصَيْنَا وَٱسْمَعْ غَيْرَ مُسْمَعٍۢ وَرَٰعِنَا لَيًّۢا بِأَلْسِنَتِهِمْ وَطَعْنًۭا فِى ٱلدِّينِ ۚ وَلَوْ أَنَّهُمْ قَالُوا۟ سَمِعْنَا وَأَطَعْنَا وَٱسْمَعْ وَٱنظُرْنَا لَكَانَ خَيْرًۭا لَّهُمْ وَأَقْوَمَ وَلَـٰكِن لَّعَنَهُمُ ٱللَّهُ بِكُفْرِهِمْ فَلَا يُؤْمِنُونَ إِلَّا قَلِيلًۭا
englishTranslationText:
Some	 of	 the	 Jews	 interchange	 the	 words	
from	 their	 places	 and	 say,	 “We	 hear	 and	
disobey”	 - and	 they	 say	 “Hear- may	 you	
not	be	able	to	hear”	- and	they	say	“Raena	
(Be	 considerate	 towards	 us)”	 distorting	 it	
with	their	tongues	and	in	order	to	slander	
religion;	 had	 they	 said,	 “We	 hear	 and	we	
obey”	 and	 “Kindly	 listen	 to	 us,	 O	 dear	
Prophet,”	and	“Look	mercifully	upon	us,	O	
dear	 Prophet”,	 it	 would	 have	 been	 much	
better	 for	 them	and	more	just	- but	Allah
has	 cursed	 them	 for	 their	 disbelief;	 so	
they	do	not	believe	except	a	little
romanUrduTranslationText:
Kuch Yahūdi	 kalāmoñ	 (Irshadāt-eKhudāwandi)	ko	unki	jagah	se	pherte	haiñ	
aur	kahte	haiñ	ham	ne	sunā	aur	na	māna	
aur	suniye	āp	sunāye	na	jāyeiñ	aur	rā‘inā	
kahte	 haiñ	 zubāneiñ	 pher	 kar	 aur deen	
meiñ	 tā’ne	 ke	liye	aur	agar	woh	 kahte	 ke	
ham	ne	sunā	aur	mānā	aur	huzoor	hamāri	
bāt	 suneiñ	 aur	 huzoor	 ham	 par	 nazar	
farmāyeiñ	 to	 unke	 liye	 bhalāi	 aur	 rāsti	
meiñ	ziyāda	hotā	lekin	un	par	to	Allah	ne	
la'nat	 ki	 un	 ke	 kufr	 ke	 sabab	 to	 yaqeen	
nahiñ	rakhte magar	thodā.

arabicText: مِّنَ ٱلَّذِينَ هَادُوا۟ يُحَرِّفُونَ ٱلْكَلِمَ عَن مَّوَاضِعِهِۦ وَيَقُولُونَ سَمِعْنَا وَعَصَيْنَا وَٱسْمَعْ غَيْرَ مُسْمَعٍۢ وَرَٰعِنَا لَيًّۢا بِأَلْسِنَتِهِمْ وَطَعْنًۭا فِى ٱلدِّينِ ۚ وَلَوْ أَنَّهُمْ قَالُوا۟ سَمِعْنَا وَأَطَعْنَا وَٱسْمَعْ وَٱنظُرْنَا لَكَانَ خَيْرًۭا لَّهُمْ وَأَقْوَمَ وَلَـٰكِن لَّعَنَهُمُ ٱللَّهُ بِكُفْرِهِمْ فَلَا يُؤْمِنُونَ إِلَّا قَلِيلًۭا
englishTranslationText:
Some	 of	 the	 Jews	 interchange	 the	 words	
from	 their	 places	 and	 say,	 “We	 hear	 and	
disobey”	 - and	 they	 say	 “Hear- may	 you	
not	be	able	to	hear”	- and	they	say	“Raena	
(Be	 considerate	 towards	 us)”	 distorting	 it	
with	their	tongues	and	in	order	to	slander	
religion;	 had	 they	 said,	 “We	 hear	 and	we	
obey”	 and	 “Kindly	 listen	 to	 us,	 O	 dear	
Prophet,”	and	“Look	mercifully	upon	us,	O	
dear	 Prophet”,	 it	 would	 have	 been	 much	
better	 for	 them	and	more	just	- but	Allah
has	 cursed	 them	 for	 their	 disbelief;	 so	
they	do	not	believe	except	a	little
romanUrduTranslationText:
Kuch Yahūdi	 kalāmoñ	 (Irshadāt-eKhudāwandi)	ko	unki	jagah	se	pherte	haiñ	
aur	kahte	haiñ	ham	ne	sunā	aur	na	māna	
aur	suniye	āp	sunāye	na	jāyeiñ	aur	rā‘inā	
kahte	 haiñ	 zubāneiñ	 pher	 kar	 aur deen	
meiñ	 tā’ne	 ke	liye	aur	agar	woh	 kahte	 ke	
ham	ne	sunā	aur	mānā	aur	huzoor	hamāri	
bāt	 suneiñ	 aur	 huzoor	 ham	 par	 nazar	
farmāyeiñ	 to	 unke	 liye	 bhalāi	 aur	 rāsti	
meiñ	ziyāda	hotā	lekin	un	par	to	Allah	ne	
la'nat	 ki	 un	 ke	 kufr	 ke	 sabab	 to	 yaqeen	
nahiñ	rakhte magar	thodā.

arabicText: يَـٰٓأَيُّهَا ٱلَّذِينَ أُوتُوا۟ ٱلْكِتَـٰبَ ءَامِنُوا۟ بِمَا نَزَّلْنَا مُصَدِّقًۭا لِّمَا مَعَكُم مِّن قَبْلِ أَن نَّطْمِسَ وُجُوهًۭا فَنَرُدَّهَا عَلَىٰٓ أَدْبَارِهَآ أَوْ نَلْعَنَهُمْ كَمَا لَعَنَّآ أَصْحَـٰبَ ٱلسَّبْتِ ۚ وَكَانَ أَمْرُ ٱللَّهِ مَفْعُولًا
englishTranslationText:
. O	 People	 given	 the	 Book(s)!	 Believe	 in	
what	We	 have	 sent	 down	 confirming	 the	
Book	 which	 you	 possess,	 before	 We	
transform	 some	 faces	 so	 turning	 them	
towards	 their	 backs,	 or	 curse	 them	 like	
We	 had	 cursed	 the	 people	 of	 Sabth;	 and	
(know	 that)	 the	 Allah’s	 command	 is	
always	carried	out!
romanUrduTranslationText:
Aey	kitāb	wālo	Imān	lāo	us	par	jo	ham	ne	
utāra	 tumhāre	 sāth	 wāli	 kitāb	 ki	 tasdeeq	
farmāta	qabl	iske	ke	ham	bigād	deiñ	kuch	
muñhoñ	 ko	 to	 unheiñ	 pher	 deiñ	 unki	
peeth	ki	taraf	yā	unheiñ	la'nat	kareiñ	jaisi	
la'nat	 ki	 hafta	 wāloñ	 par	 aur	 khudā	 ka	
hukm	hokar	rahe.

arabicText: إِنَّ ٱللَّهَ لَا يَغْفِرُ أَن يُشْرَكَ بِهِۦ وَيَغْفِرُ مَا دُونَ ذَٰلِكَ لِمَن يَشَآءُ ۚ وَمَن يُشْرِكْ بِٱللَّهِ فَقَدِ ٱفْتَرَىٰٓ إِثْمًا عَظِيمًا
englishTranslationText:
Undoubtedly	 Allah does	 not	 forgive	 (the	
sin	of	)	of	disbelieving	in	Him	and	forgives	
anything	 lower	 than	 it	 to	 whomever	 He	
wills;	 and	 whoever	 ascribes	 partners	 to	
Allah has	invented	a	tremendous	sin.
romanUrduTranslationText:
. Beshak	Allah	usey	nahi	bakhsh	tā	ke	uske	
hāth	 kufr	 kiyā	jāye	 aur	 kufr	 se	 neeche	jo	
kuch	 hai	 jise	 chāhe	 mu'āf	 farmā	 detā	 hai	
aur	jis	ne	Khudā	ka	shareek	thahrāya	us	ne	bade	gunāh	ka	toofān	bāndha.

arabicText: أَلَمْ تَرَ إِلَى ٱلَّذِينَ يُزَكُّونَ أَنفُسَهُم ۚ بَلِ ٱللَّهُ يُزَكِّى مَن يَشَآءُ وَلَا يُظْلَمُونَ فَتِيلًا
englishTranslationText:
Did	 you	 not	 see	 those	 who	 proclaim	 their	 piety	(cleanliness	 of	 deeds)?	 In	 fact	 Allah purifies	
whomever	He	wills,	and	no	injustice,	even	equal	 to	 the	hair	upon	a	date	seed	will	be	done	 to	
them
romanUrduTranslationText:
Kyā	tum	ne	unheiñ	na	dekhā	jo	apni	khud suthri	bayān	karte	haiñ	balke	Allah	jise	chāhe	suthrā	
kare	aur	un	par	zulm	na	hoga	dana	khurmā	ke	dore	barābar.

arabicText: ٱنظُرْ كَيْفَ يَفْتَرُونَ عَلَى ٱللَّهِ ٱلْكَذِبَ ۖ وَكَفَىٰ بِهِۦٓ إِثْمًۭا مُّبِينًا
englishTranslationText: See	how	they	fabricate	lies	against	Allah!	And	this	is	a	sufficient	manifest	sin.
romanUrduTranslationText: . Dekho	kaisā	Allah	par	jhoot	bāndh	rahe	haiñ	aur	yeh	kāfi	hai	sareeh	(Khula)	gunāh

arabicText: أَلَمْ تَرَ إِلَى ٱلَّذِينَ أُوتُوا۟ نَصِيبًۭا مِّنَ ٱلْكِتَـٰبِ يُؤْمِنُونَ بِٱلْجِبْتِ وَٱلطَّـٰغُوتِ وَيَقُولُونَ لِلَّذِينَ كَفَرُوا۟ هَـٰٓؤُلَآءِ أَهْدَىٰ مِنَ ٱلَّذِينَ ءَامَنُوا۟ سَبِيلًا
englishTranslationText:
Did	 you	 not	 see	 those	who	 received	 a	 portion	 of	 the	 Book,	 that	 they	 believe	in	idols	 and	 the	
devil,	and	say	regarding	the	disbelievers	that	they	are	more	rightly	guided	than	the	Muslims?
romanUrduTranslationText:
Kiya	tum	ne	woh	na	dekhe	jinheiñ	kitāb	ka	ek	hissa	milā	Imān	lāte	haiñ	but	aur	shaitān	par	aur	
kāfiroñ	ko	kahte	haiñ	ke	yeh	Musalmanoñ	se	ziyāda	rāh	par	haiñ.

arabicText: أُو۟لَـٰٓئِكَ ٱلَّذِينَ لَعَنَهُمُ ٱللَّهُ ۖ وَمَن يَلْعَنِ ٱللَّهُ فَلَن تَجِدَ لَهُۥ نَصِيرًا
englishTranslationText:
It	is	they	whom	Allah has	cursed;	and	 for	
those	 whom	 Allah has	 cursed,	 you	
(Prophet	Muhammad - peace	and	blessings	
be	 upon	 him)	 will	 never	 find	 any	
supporter.
romanUrduTranslationText:
Yeh	haiñ	jin	par	Allah	ne	la'nat	ki	aur	jise	
Khudā	 la'nat	 kare	 to	 hargiz	 uska	 koi	 yār	
na	pāye	ga

arabicText: أَمْ لَهُمْ نَصِيبٌۭ مِّنَ ٱلْمُلْكِ فَإِذًۭا لَّا يُؤْتُونَ ٱلنَّاسَ نَقِيرًا
englishTranslationText:
. Do	they	have	some	share	in	the	kingship?-
if	it	were,	they	would	not	give	to	mankind	
even	a	single	sesame.
romanUrduTranslationText:
Kiya	mulk	meiñ	 unka	 kuch	 hissa	 hai	 aisa	
ho	to	logoñ	ko	til	bhar	na	deiñ

arabicText: أَمْ يَحْسُدُونَ ٱلنَّاسَ عَلَىٰ مَآ ءَاتَىٰهُمُ ٱللَّهُ مِن فَضْلِهِۦ ۖ فَقَدْ ءَاتَيْنَآ ءَالَ إِبْرَٰهِيمَ ٱلْكِتَـٰبَ وَٱلْحِكْمَةَ وَءَاتَيْنَـٰهُم مُّلْكًا عَظِيمًۭا
englishTranslationText:
Or	do	they	envy	people	due	to	what	Allah
has	 given	 them	 from	 His	 grace?	 In	 that	
case,	 We	 bestowed	 the	 Book	 and	 the	
wisdom	 upon	 the	 family	 of	 Ibrahim
(Abraham),	 and	 We	 gave	 them	 a	 great	
kingdom.
romanUrduTranslationText:
Ya	 logoñ	 se	 hasad	 karte	 haiñ	 us	 par	 jo	
Allah	 ne	 unheiñ	apne	 fazl	 se	 diya	 to	 ham	
ne	 to	 Ibrāheem ki	 aulād	 ko	 Kitāb	 aur	
Hikmat	‘atā	farmāyi	aur	unheiñ	badā	mulk	
diya

arabicText: فَمِنْهُم مَّنْ ءَامَنَ بِهِۦ وَمِنْهُم مَّن صَدَّ عَنْهُ ۚ وَكَفَىٰ بِجَهَنَّمَ سَعِيرًا
englishTranslationText:
So	 some	 of	 them	 believed	in	it	and	 some	
of	 them	 turned	 away	 from	 it;	 and	
sufficient	is	hell,	a	blazing	fire!
romanUrduTranslationText:
To	un	meiñ	 koi	us	par	 Imān	lāya	aur	 kisi	
ne	us	se	mooñh	pherā	aur	dozakh	kāfi	hai	
bhadakti	āg

arabicText: إِنَّ ٱلَّذِينَ كَفَرُوا۟ بِـَٔايَـٰتِنَا سَوْفَ نُصْلِيهِمْ نَارًۭا كُلَّمَا نَضِجَتْ جُلُودُهُم بَدَّلْنَـٰهُمْ جُلُودًا غَيْرَهَا لِيَذُوقُوا۟ ٱلْعَذَابَ ۗ إِنَّ ٱللَّهَ كَانَ عَزِيزًا حَكِيمًۭا
englishTranslationText:
We	shall	soon	put	those	who	disbelieve	in	
Our	 signs	 into	 the	 fire;	 whenever	 their	
skins	 are	 cooked	 (fully	 burnt)	 We	 shall	
change	 them	 for	 new	 skins	 so	 they	 may	
taste	 the	 punishment	 (again	 and	 again);	
indeed	Allah is	Almighty,	Wise
romanUrduTranslationText:
Jinhoñ	ne	hamāri	Āyatoñ	ka	inkār	kiya	anqareeb	 ham	 un	 ko	 āag	 meiñ	 dākhil	
kareñge	jab	kabhi	un	ki	khāleñ	pak	jāyeiñ	
gi	ham	unke	siwā	aur	khāleñ	badal	deñge	
ke	‘azāb	ka	mazā	leiñ	beshak	Allah	ghālib	
hikmat	wāla	hai.

arabicText: وَٱلَّذِينَ ءَامَنُوا۟ وَعَمِلُوا۟ ٱلصَّـٰلِحَـٰتِ سَنُدْخِلُهُمْ جَنَّـٰتٍۢ تَجْرِى مِن تَحْتِهَا ٱلْأَنْهَـٰرُ خَـٰلِدِينَ فِيهَآ أَبَدًۭا ۖ لَّهُمْ فِيهَآ أَزْوَٰجٌۭ مُّطَهَّرَةٌۭ ۖ وَنُدْخِلُهُمْ ظِلًّۭا ظَلِيلًا
englishTranslationText:
. And	 those	 who	 believed	 and	 did	 good	
deeds,	 We	 shall	 soon	 admit	 them	 into	
Gardens	 beneath	 which	 rivers	 flow	 -
abiding	 in	 it forever;	 in	 it	 for	 them	 are	
pure	wives	- and	We	shall	admit	them	into	
places	of	plentiful	shade.
romanUrduTranslationText:
Aur	jo	log	Imān	lāye	aur	achchhe	kām	kiye	
an-qareeb	 ham	 unheiñ	 bāghoñ	 meiñ	 le	
jāyeñ	ge	jin	ke	neeche	nahreiñ		rawāñ un	
meiñ	 hamesha	 raheñ	ge	 unke	liye	wahāñ	
suthri	 biwiyāñ	 haiñ	 aur	 ham	 unheiñ	
wahāñ	dākhil	kareñge

arabicText: ۞ إِنَّ ٱللَّهَ يَأْمُرُكُمْ أَن تُؤَدُّوا۟ ٱلْأَمَـٰنَـٰتِ إِلَىٰٓ أَهْلِهَا وَإِذَا حَكَمْتُم بَيْنَ ٱلنَّاسِ أَن تَحْكُمُوا۟ بِٱلْعَدْلِ ۚ إِنَّ ٱللَّهَ نِعِمَّا يَعِظُكُم بِهِۦٓ ۗ إِنَّ ٱللَّهَ كَانَ سَمِيعًۢا بَصِيرًۭا
englishTranslationText:
Indeed	Allah commands	you	to	hand	over	whatever	you	hold	in	trust,	to	their	owners	- and	that	
whenever	 you	 judge	 between	 people,	 judge	 with	 fairness;	 undoubtedly	 Allah gives	 you	 an	
excellent	advice;	indeed	Allah is	All	Hearing,	All	Seeing.
romanUrduTranslationText:
8. Jahāñ	 sāya	 hi	 sāya	 hoga	 beshak	 Allah	
tumheiñ	hukm	detā	hai	ke	amānteiñ	jinki	
haiñ	 unheiñ	 supurd	 karo	 aur	 yeh	 ke	 jab	
logoñ	 meiñ	 faisla	 karo	 to	 insāf	 ke	 sāth	
faislā	karo	beshak	Allah	tumheiñ	kiyā	hi	khoob	nasihat	farmāta	hai	beshak	Allah	suntā	dekhta	
hai.
